pullRequest.title: Fix reentrancy bug in io_uring transport implementation related to
pullRequest.bodyText:
writes
Motivation:
We need to carefully manage state in terms of writing to guard against
rentrancy problems that could lead to corrupt state in the
ChannelOutboundBuffer
Modifications:
Only reset the flag once removeBytes(...) was called
Result:
No more reentrancy bug related to writes.

commit.message:
Fix reentrancy bug in io_uring transport implementation related to
writes

Motivation:

We need to carefully manage state in terms of writing to guard against
rentrancy problems that could lead to corrupt state in the
ChannelOutboundBuffer

Modifications:

Only reset the flag once removeBytes(...) was called

Result:

No more reentrancy bug related to writes.

nodes.bodyText: because count will always be > 1 here?
